Name: Move
Text: Move to an adjacent, accessible Zone.

Name: Spate
Text: Distribute (Lv+PIB) damage to multiple targets in your Zone.

Name: Focus
Text: Reroll a roll you just made. This can be done during any Phase.

Name: Inspect
Text: Choose (PIB) targets. You understand the behavior and a weakness of those targets.

Name: Strategem
Text: You or an ally can Move once during the Player Phase without spending AP. This can be done once during the Player Phase.

Name: Evade
Text: When you take damage, Move without spending AP. Reduce the damage by (Lv). This can be done during any phase, once per phase.

Name: First-Aid
Text: Heal (Lv) Health to any target in your Zone.

Name: Entrust
Text: Give a target 1 AP. This can be done during any Phase, once per Phase.
